html.problem:
CheckPoint: Speed of a Rocket
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
a=lc_random(1,3,1) b=lc_random(1,3,1) M=lc_choose(a,3.0e23,8.0e23,2.5e24) R=lc_choose(b,3.0e6,7.0e6,1.2e7) G=6.67E-11
v= math.sqrt(6* G* M/ R)
A rocket is launched straight up from the surface of the planet of mass $M kg and radius $R m at twice the escape speed. What is the speed of the rocket far away from the planet? Neglect the atmospheric friction. The universal gravitational constant is $G SI units.
\(v=\)
